comment: Maybe I'm just dumb, that I can't figure out how to set an alarm using this app. At this point, I'm uninstalling it and I'll look for something else that's easier to use.

author: Haley Priebe
comment: Matthew Howell, I had the same problem. I had to uninstall and install again on my phone. I also had to install on my watch, then I was able to set alarms. Hope you get it to work.

author: Tyra Glispie
comment: It would be perfect if you could change snooze time

author: Keith Ellis
comment: I'd vote 5 stars, but if the watch is too far away from your phone it only vibrates once (not enough to wake you) then stops.  You can't trust it.  All I want is for the vibrate feature to work, and keep buzzing strongly until I wake and shut it off.  Is that too much to ask?

author: Rahul Amaram
comment: Been using it for a while on my asus zenwatch 2. This app is much better than the default alarm app in wear. But waht makes this deserve 5 star is the terrific support from tje developer. I requested a feature (not very complex) and it was implemented in few hours. That was just awesome!

author: Francois Nguyen
comment: So far, the only alarm app that vibrates even on theater mode on AW. That alone makes it worth 5 stars!

author: Chip Adair
comment: Like the alarm, wish I could figure out more settings, like how to change the 3 minute snooze time to something more like 10 minutes

author: Daniel Berger
comment: I can't get this app to save an alarm; when I create an alarm, I can't get out of the edit screen without canceling my changes.  It won't sync with my watch so far as I can tell, and it won't allow me to set a new alarm.   My watch is an Asus ZenWatch 2.

author: Patrick Nikola Assad
comment: Can we set alarm with sound in watch with vibrate??
title: Sound

author: Marija Robinson
comment: A standout (and nearly standalone) reminder app for watches. Would be perfect if we could customize the snooze time for each reminder.

author: Mario DeSantis
comment: First morning using the app, woke me up!  +10 in my book!  My only suggestion, make a dark option.  A lot of apps allow for this, and on a smartwatch app waking you up at 5am, a white text on black background would be MUCH more appealing.  I'd give it 6 stars if that was available ;)

author: Steve Smith
comment: Note 4, Android 6.0.1   PROS: Ability to set alarm for just the phone, watch or both.  CONS: Interface is rough, can be improved for a more intuitive experience.  My problem is that it started going off without showing up on either my watch or the home page. I work in a hospital where I need to be able to dismiss an alarm quickly. Thus, the reason I was trying to find an alarm that would allow me to Dismiss/Snooze from my Smartwatch as I can't get to my phone that quickly. Uninstalling
title: Has Become Unreliable

author: Christopher Scheib
comment: I love the feature where placing the watch on a charger will prevent pending alarms from initiating. It's perfect for those mornings where you wake up, swipe to snooze, but then just get up before the alarm goes off again. I can walk away without worrying about it buzzing in my wife's ear while I'm getting ready for my day.
title: Use it loyally

author: Dan Herbert
comment: Simple app that does what it says and does it well.

author: Steve Mann
comment: Love the Google Calendar intergration. Would like to see on phone volume increase option for optional time period, ie alarm volume increase from 0% to 100% in 30 secs. Also alarm to go off for more than 2 mins max, preferably upto an hour.
title: Great Idea App For Phone & Wear

author: Lurch DeVahl
comment: Probably one of the best wear alarms I've tried. It works even in theater mode... however my recommendation would be to add the option to just have vibration and keep the screen dim while in theater mode... or even levels of dimming option. I'd give full five stars with either of these.
title: Fairly decent...

author: Yuval Hirshel-Harel
comment: The UX can be improved a bit but as overall this app works great for me. Thx
title: Works Great !

author: harry glenn mercado
comment: very useful, no issues encountered.
title: great

author: Francis Lai
comment: Seems a bit buggy,  can't delete alarms / not always setting them off.  Better interface than stock,  although it would be nice if you could make the scroll infinite (from 23:00 to 00:00 without having to scroll up again)  and swith snooze /awake (it's the other way round on stock so bit confusing).  Also change snooze time.  But it's a work in progress otherwise

author: Will Hostens
comment: I love the design, the strong colors, please don't applefy the app with updated "material design". aka Flat and Booooring. Blech. I just bought it but it seems to work well. I would like to see different ring tones available for each alarm that rings on the mobile. Thanks
title: Love it

author: Andrew Jones
comment: I'm pleased with this app. I wanted an alarm that I could disable temporarily and re-enable when I wanted, rather than deleting it altogether, and one which stays silent when my watch is charging. The standard alarm built into android wear doesn't do either of these things so this is money well spent. Would have given it 5 stars if the alarm screen on the watch looked a bit sharper.
title: Good on the whole

author: Sergiy M.
comment: Google just updated the stock clock to cooperate with Wear. Please fix issues and add features otherwise you will lose customers! Issues: 1) no confirmation of creating alarm. Should be additional step in wizard IMO 2) weird dismissal of the alarm, I mean swipe towards the edge of the screen 3) most important NO BACKUP feature. Had to factory reset the watch and lost all the alarms even though didn't reinstall the app on the phone. Please implement a backup, export/import, etc. feature!
title: The best for now

author: Eric Nygren
comment: Not the  prettiest app but works great for setting multiple watch alarms. Love it!
title: Excellent Android Wear Alarm

author: Peter Landymore
comment: The interface could use a bit of polish, but functionally is excellent 😀 Being able to have alarms set automatically based on my schedule is an absolute god send. This developer is my personal hero.
title: Finally!!

author: MLG Bill Cipher
comment: This helped me find my watch ,  I was reorganizing my room and placed my watch somewhere to shower and could not find it. This was the only app that could make the Watch alarm with only the phone. You should make a separate app called FindMyWatch

author: Thiago Tardelli
comment: App has a good potential, but it's in very early stages at this point. Needs lots of refinements. Specially in design.

author: Christopher Kenyon
comment: I like the app but i would like the option to add a caption to be displayed, i wanted it for bodybuilding to show what food i needed to eat at certain times, but no option to add any caption at all

author: Tereasa Moffett
comment: I just bought it to test the functionality and practicality of the app. As an alarm, there are better options available, but it will at least reminds you of calendar events.
title: Bought to review.

author: Matthew Simon
comment: Calendar alarms not working for me. Wish I could have tried the app before purchasing.
title: Not Working for Me

author: Kyle Graeser
comment: Helped me do a 3 day, every three hour Cutler protocol for many months.
title: Great!

author: Paweł Wierzbicki
comment: I cant set up as default alarm app in actions menu.
title: Actions

author: Connie I
comment: Great little alarm!

author: Alexei Watson
comment: Much more useful than the stock android wear alarm. I feel like the UI needs work though, the alarm takes a few swipes to turn off, and then directions are switched from stock swipe functions. Mimicking the answer/reject UI of a phone call would be perfect.
title: Useful, because of theatre mode alarms

author: Paul Miller
comment: The built in alarm function in Android Wear just wasn't flexible enough but this certainly meets my needs - particularly the ability to suspend rather than delete an alarm. The interface isn't the prettiest and the 'retro'' digital watch appearance is definitely not to my taste but it does the job and I'll stick with it in the hope it'll be given a face-lift before too long.  Edited to add, it took me a while to work out how to add labels to alarms I'd set but, now I know how it's done (long press on the entry in the Alarm Listing on the mobile app) I'm happy with the way it works.  I'm just left with cringing over the app's appearance on the watch.  Other than that, it's all good!
title: Not pretty but does the job!

author: Aravind Vijayaraghavan
comment: This is just what I need but sometimes it drives me crazy. The alarms on my phone and watch suddenly don't talk to each other any more. Changing something on the phone doesn't change it on the watch. New alarms set on the watch with 'phone only' setting still rings only on wear. The app isn't handling timezones well so when I'm travelling if I set the alarm then it sets the value in my corresponding home timezone on the phone while the correct timezone is used on the watch etc.
title: Great but flawed, please fix

author: Yavuz Engiz
comment: You can't set the volume for alarm, as a result you can't wake up even if your life depended on it. You are warned..
title: Don't expect to wake up

author: Raymond Barrett
comment: I've set all the alarms but they need titles. They go off but what are they for? (E.g. "pick up kids" or "Meeting with Dan.") they ring great but what are they? Also should have option to ring thru even if volume down like in morning to wake up. Stock alarm apps do that.
title: Title for alarms?

author: Benigno Bejaran
comment: The times are not working properly... 13:00=1:00, 14:00=2:00, etc... Right? Am I doing something wrong? I set a time like 17 and it will work as if it were 5am not 5pm! Very annoying and I have tried the opposite but still nothing. Give us an option to use 12hr, oh and titles would be great.
title: Not working properly

author: Reichard Könige
comment: This thing is fantastic.  Synced to phone,  repeating alarms,  snooze,  dismiss,  just perfect. It's only missing voice integration (minor).  Something like... "OK google,  show alarms.... set alarm for 10am daily". Phone side alarm tone wont change from silent no matter what tone I choose(minor). This means that while alarms do play the chosen sound you won't see which you previously selected since the selection box always starts at the first entry (silent on my phone).

reply.author: NeFa Studio
reply.content: Have you checked the checkbox to ring the alarm? (one right above tone select). If yes, please check phone call volume level.

title: Perfect(revised) Just buy it

author: Gelo Goloy
comment: This totally goes off on the watch even on Mute or Theater Mode! Now I don't have to worry about not waking up on time!
title: Excellent alarm app!
